title: Print, "Citibank letterhead design", ca. 1975
inscribed: Printed in orange ink, upper right: CITIBANK. Printed in gray ink, upper left margin: Citibank N.A./ 55 Wall Street/ New York, N.Y./10015; center left: Pamela P. Flaherty/ Vice President.
description: Citibank logo at top right with Citibank in orange text and a circle with a four-pointed star inside following. Under this a thin dark line runs the almost the width of the page.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Citibank letterhead design", ca. 1975.
ca. 1975. Letterpress on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-75.
